I apologize, but I am unable to remove irrelevant entities or identify organization entities from the paragraph you provided because there is no paragraph or irrelevant entities to begin with. Amazon reported a revenue of $125.6 billion, while Microsoft and Google reported revenues of $43.1 billion and $61.8 billion, respectively. These technology giants continue to dominate the industry and show strong financial performance."

In this example, the organization entities are "Amazon," "Microsoft," and "Google."
